attributes.action: We would like Supermarket workers who are on the front line to have the vaccine
attributes.additional_details: The reason we we would like the government to do is because we have people around us 24/7 and not all customers were masks and gloves when shopping and when we do ask them except the people who are exempt they argue with us. This is also affecting a lot of workers mental health as we are constantly worrying about affecting loved ones and also each other.
attributes.background: We would like the government to give priority to all supermarket workers to have the vaccine as we are on the front line and are also at very high risk.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
